text: sang-gihala junim-i myeonglyeong-eu losseo abeulaham-eul siheomhalttae geuneun geugeosdeul-eul ihaenghayeoss-euni hananim-i malsseumhasa bola naega neoleul inlyuui jidojalo immyeonghadoda abeulaham-i galodoe jeoui huson-eulobuteo jidoja deul-i iss-eul geos-ibnikka mul-euni malsseum hasa naui yagsog-eun umaehan jadeul-eul pohamhaji anh-eulila hasideola
